question: Display the air traffic controllers and ground staff whose salary is $60,000 per year.
sql_query1:
SELECT Air_traffic_controller.name
FROM Air_traffic_controller
WHERE Air_traffic_controller.Salary = "60000 per year"
UNION
SELECT Ground_staff.name
FROM Ground_staff
WHERE Ground_staff.Salary = "60000 per year"
sql_query2:
SELECT Air_traffic_controller.name
FROM Air_traffic_controller
UNION
SELECT Ground_staff.name
FROM Ground_staff
WHERE Ground_staff.Salary = "60000 per year"
interpretation1: can you show both the air traffic controllers and ground staff members whose annual salary is $60,000?
interpretation2: Please list all air traffic controllers and also display ground staff members who earn $60,000 annually.
